attributes.action: encourage local bus companies to plan a route through croft, skegness, lincolnshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have approx 3/4 mile walk to the nearest bus stop and there is hardly any footpath on the way, not every body in our village drives, and, ther are several mothers with children and the elder generation that are in need of a passing bus service, the bus companies state that it is not viable for them to run through our village, but they have NO option when there is a accident on the main A52, why not keep it permanent then they will not have to divert.
